revised_title: Effects and Uses of Vitrum Antimonii Ceratum: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This article discusses the preparation, effects, and uses of Vitrum Antimonii Ceratum, a medicine made from antimony glass. It is effective in treating bloody-fluxes, diarrhea, simple loosenesses, quartan agues, and certain cases of fluor albus. The medicine should be given cautiously, starting with small doses and gradually increasing as needed. It can be used safely in pregnant women and children. The author provides detailed instructions on how to use the medicine, including the dosage, frequency, and precautions to take when administering it.
